      • cleanUp

        This method should be invoked in the onDestroy of your main Activity so that the clean up routines for Ads will be invoked
        Parameters:
        context - The context to be used

      • setAdsCacheSize

        public void setAdsCacheSize(android.content.Context context,
                            long cacheSize)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException,
                            IllegalStateException
        Sets the maximum size allocated in bytes for the Ads cache. This should be invoked before the cache is initialized ie before creating any Ad instances If not cache would be initialized with the default size 0f 256 MB The cache size should be between 50 MB and 2000 MB both inclusive. If the size specified is outside this range then cache will be initialized with the default size To disable caching pass 0 as size Please see the method cleanUp to perform necessary clean up activities for cache
        Parameters:
        cacheSize - size in bytes to be allocated for the Ads cache. This should be between 50 MB and 2000 MB both inclusive.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
        IllegalStateException

      • getCacheSize

        public long getCacheSize(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the current Ads cache size If no cache size has been set then the cache will use a default size of 256 MB
        Returns:
        the current cache size in bytes if the cache is initialized, -1 if the cache has not yet been initialized

      • getBaseUrl

        public String getBaseUrl()
        Get the base url to request ads.
        Returns:
        endpoint to request ads.

      • getNativeAdForZone

        @Deprecated
public PwNativeAd getNativeAdForZone(android.content.Context context,
                                                 String zone)
        Deprecated. Use PwNativeAd.getInstance(Context, String).
        Factory method which generates a native ad object.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context that will be used to build a native ad
        zone - Identifier of ad placement to be loaded.
        Returns:
        A native ad object that is ready to be loaded. Call PwNativeAd.load() to initiate ad request.
        See Also:
        PwNativeAd
